title: Lyndon B Johnson National Historical Park: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases              If one morning I walked on top of the water across the Potomac River, the headline that afternoon would read "President Can't Swim"  --Lyndon B. Johnson          Subscribe  | What is RSS     August 08, 2016  National Park Service Centennial to be Commemorated  On Thursday, August 25, 2016, you are invited to join the park staff at Lyndon B. Johnson National Historical Park to celebrate 100 years of preserving many of America’s most treasured places.
